title: MLB Pickle Game Card position
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is logged in

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the Games tab on the MLB Pickle launch date
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the MLB Pickle’s game card has the topmost position

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the Games tab a week after the MLB Pickle launch date
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the MLB Pickle’s game card has the 3rd top position

title: MLB Pickle game
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on the MLB Pickle game card
custom_expected: THEN game card should open a webview at the following url: mlbpickle.com

title: How To Play modal
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is logged in
AND user is playing Pickle

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user open the Pickle game
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user sees the tutorial modal

Things to display: 
* 'How to Play Pickle' title
* exit icon on the top right corner
* copy 'Guess today's mystery MLB player within nine guesses.'
* green bar
* copy 'Green in any column indicates a match!'
* yellow bar
* copy 'Lg/Div: Yellow indicates that the player plays in either the revealed League or Division.'
* yellow bar
* copy 'Age: Yellow indicates 2 years within the player's actual age.'
* yellow bar
* 'Position: Yellow indicates the player can play this position, but it's not his primary  
* 'Start Playing' button

AND modal has a thin white outline

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on exit button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN modal is closed 
AND user is brought to the Pickle game

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on 'Start Playing' button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN modal is closed 
AND user is brought to the Pickle game

title: Pickle UI
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN user opens the Pickle game
custom_expected:
User is displayed with the Pickle webview: 

* Home plate icon in the top left corner
* MLB Play logo 
* neon yellow Pickle logo
* hamburger menu in the top right corner
* text box with 'Guess today's mystery player' copy and 'Pick for me' cta
* 'team', 'lg./div', 'b', 't', 'born', 'age', 'pos.' columns
* 9 horizontal sections

title: Player's country of birth
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN user plays the Pickle game
custom_expected:
THEN player's country of Birth is displayed in 'Born' column
AND the country is displayed in Alpha 3 Code

title: Tracking
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is logged in
custom_expected: User's picks and stats are tracked per device and not uid

title: EC - player headshot
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN user played the Pickle
AND user is on the Pickle results modal
custom_expected:
THEN user sees the mystery player headshot
AND the player headshot is not clickable

title: Webview on mobile
custom_steps: WHEN user opens mlbpickle.com in the browser
custom_expected:
THEN user is able to play Pickle
AND Pickle UI looks good

title: Pick for me
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is logged in
AND user is playing Pickle

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user didn't make a first pick of the day yet
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN 'Pick for me' button is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on the 'Pick for me' button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the first player will automatically be picked for the user
AND user can not click on the 'Pick for me' button second time

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user made their first pick
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN 'Pick for me' button is NOT displayed

title: EC - Pick for me
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is logged in
AND user is playing Pickle

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on the 'Pick for me' button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the mystery player is not automatically picked as a first pick

title: User guesses the mystery player - flow
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is logged in
AND user is playing Pickle

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user made the pick and the pick is correct
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the fireworks are displayed on the screen
AND user is taken to the Results modal

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user closes the results page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the search bar shows how many tries the user had
AND all the selected players are displayed

title: User did not guess the mystery player - flow
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is logged in
AND user is playing Pickle

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user used all the tries and did not make the correct pick
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is takes to the Results modal

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user closes the results page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the search bar says 'Better luck tomorrow'
AND all the selected players are displayed

title: EC - selecting same player twice
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is logged in
AND user is playing Pickle
custom_steps:
WHEN user selected the player
AND types the player's name again
custom_expected:
THEN this player's name is grayed out
AND user is not able to select it

title: Explanation pop-ups
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is logged in
AND user is playing Pickle

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user made their first prediction for the day
AND prediction matches the category (if marked in green or yellow)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the explanation pop-up appears
AND if there are more than 2 matches, then explanation pop-up appears one after another and they don't overlap each other 
![](index.php?/attachments/get/13403574)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on the exit icon
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the explanation pop-up disappears

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user makes another prediction
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the explanation pop-up does not appear

title: Search bar functionality
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is logged in
AND user is playing Pickle
custom_steps: WHEN user searches for the player
custom_expected:
THEN the search field should only search for "starts with" not "contained"
AND "starts with" should be applied to first and last names
AND user will be displayed with up to 40 people in the search that meet the searching criteria
AND the players in the list are ordered from most correct (most green tiles) in descending order
AND if the search list has fewer players than 9, then the list section should be shortened

title: Search bar functionality - no players found
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is logged in
AND user is playing Pickle
custom_steps:
WHEN user searches for the player
AND player is not found
custom_expected:
THEN the search field should display the copy 'No player found'
AND no players should be listed

title: Search bar after user got results - user didn't win
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN user played Pickle 
AND user did not win
custom_expected:
THEN the copy in the search bar should say "Better luck tomorrow" 
AND the search bar should not be clickable

title: Search bar after user got results - user won
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN user played Pickle 
AND user won
custom_expected:
THEN the copy in the search bar should say "You won in .. tries!"
AND the search bar should not be clickable

title: User's Streak
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is logged in

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user played pickle in consecutive days and won every time
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user's streak increases every time they win
AND the current streak will be displayed in Statistics modal and results page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user missed a day of playing
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the Streak resets

title: Plural vs singular
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is logged in

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user won in one try
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the 'win' and 'try' should be displayed in singular
![](index.php?/attachments/get/13414979)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user won in more than one tries
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the 'win' and 'try' should be displayed in plural

title: Hamburger menu
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is logged in
AND user is playing Pickle

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on the hamburger icon
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is displayed with the hamburger menu
AND there are 2 items: 'How To Play' and 'My Statistics'
AND hamburger menu is 75% of the screen and is displayed on the right side of the screen
AND opacity is about 75%

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks outside the hamburger menu
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the hamburger menu is closed

title: How To Play modal
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is logged in
AND user is playing Pickle

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user opens the hamburger menu
AND user selects 'How To Play'
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user sees the tutorial modal

Things to display: 
* 'How to Play Pickle' title
* exit icon on the top right corner
* copy 'Guess today's mystery MLB player within nine guesses.'
* green bar
* copy 'Green in any column indicates a match!'
* yellow bar
* copy 'Lg/Div: Yellow indicates that the player plays in either the revealed League or Division.'
* yellow bar
* copy 'Age: Yellow indicates 2 years within the player's actual age.'
* yellow bar
* 'Position: Yellow indicates the player can play this position, but it's not his primary position.
* 'Start Playing' button

AND modal has a thin white outline

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on exit button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN modal is closed 
AND user is brought to the Pickle game

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on 'Start Playing' button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN modal is closed 
AND user is brought to the Pickle game

title: Statistics
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is logged in
AND user is playing Pickle

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user clicks on the hamburger icon
AND selects 'My Statistics'
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is displayed with 'My Statistics' page

Things to display: 
* 'My Statistics' title
* copy 'Track your progress towards your goals.'
* grid of 4 sections: Current streak, Max streak, Win percentage, Total wins

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user didn't play Pickle yet
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN all stats have 0

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user played Pickle before
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user's stats are displayed correctly

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on the exit icon
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the statistics page is closed

title: Results page - user won
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is logged in
AND user played Pickle

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the Results modal
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is displayed with: 
* 'You won Pickle!
* Your current streak is now ... wins.' (win if only one)
* mystery players name, headshot and 'View Player Highlights' link
* 'Share your win!' section 
* grid of user's picks on the left side
* copy 'You guessed the mystery MLB player in .. tries! Let your friends know your score.'
* My Statistics section (Current streak, max streak, win percentage, total wins)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on 'View Player Highlights' link
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is brought to the mlb.com page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on 'Share Results' button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is displayed with the share sheet

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on the exit button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the results modal is closed and user is brought back to the Pickle page

title: Results page - user didn't win
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is logged in
AND user played Pickle

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the Results modal
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is displayed with: 
* 'Better luck next time!'
* 'Your current streak is now 0 wins.'
* mystery players name, headshot and 'View Player Highlights' link
* 'Challenge your friends' section with.
* 'Share Results' CTA
* grid of user's picks on the left side
* My Statistics section (Current streak, max streak, win percentage, total wins)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on 'View Player Highlights' link
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is brought to the mlb.com page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on 'Share Results' button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is displayed with the share sheet

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on the exit button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the results modal is closed and user is brought back to the Pickle page

title: Pickle  - contest result card
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is logged in
AND user played Pickle

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the results of Bingo in the Results Feed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is displayed with

- user's avatar
- 'You' bubble
- date
- copy 'MLB Pickle #... - today's date
- emotes of Bingo results

title: Streak of 5
custom_preconds:
GIVEN app installed on Device
AND user logged in to the app
AND user played Bingo

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user plays Bingo for 5 days straight
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user receives a Streak of 5 Bingo badge

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user receives this badge
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user gets the badge modal

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the Feed page
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user sees the user event for this badge

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views Profile page -> Badges section -> Badge list view
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user sees this badge in the list

title: Pitcher's position
custom_preconds:
GIVEN web app is opened on browser
AND user is logged in
AND user is playing Pickle

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user searches for a Closing Pitcher
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN pitcher is noted as RP and NOT CP

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user searches for a (Two Way Player)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN pitcher is noted as TWP (Ohtani)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user searches for a player who has not pitched a game
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN player is noted as SP and NOT P

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user searches for a player who has less than 50% time pitching
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN player is noted as RP and NOT P

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user searches for a player who has more than 50% time pitching
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN player is noted as SP and NOT P
